Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its high worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product for $14000. This offer represents an excellent opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing the details with you and helping your business reach new heights. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
